resources.string:
Our measuring mechanism is based on the data virtually from all the equipment sensors, for example: 
 - the front camera tracking a head size 
 - the display measuring the heart rate 
 - the microphone detecting the level of your vocabulary 
 - the gyroscopes verifying that you do not slouch 
 - the accelerometers detecting the tremor of the body, etc. 
 
 From these data using the universal method developed by the leading Czech and American scientists (because they are always right) the size of the subjects brain is calculated and it is then displayed. The application is so correct that you have a better chance to win in the lottery than the app is wrong.
